Nigel North
Nigel North was initially inspired by the early 60's instrumental pop group Ã¢â‚¬ËœThe Shadows', and went on to study classical music through the violin and guitar, eventually discovering his real path in life, the lute, when he was 15. Basically self-taught on the lute, he has for some 20 years developed a unique musical life which embraces several and varied activities as a teacher, accompanist, soloist and writer. He published a continuo tutor (Faber 1987) representing his work and passion for this subject.

Directly downloaded as FlACs therefore no .cue etc, Covers and text can be found on related torrent.
